text: On a Search Results page template how do we get the search term(s) so we can display them on the page? Thanks.
There is a search results module.
Yeah I am using that but I would like the term displayed while not in another search bar.

I've just finished migrating a site from 1 HubSpot acc to another and one of the options for the blog is missing. I can edit the blog listing template page on the original account, but not the new one. The templates are identical.  Does anyone know how I can enable it?
